title: I can't sign up for the PBE
body: I wanted to sign up for the PBE and it just sends me to a 404 or 505 page, any reason why?{{champion:62}}

replies.body: Currently, pbe signups are closed for maintenance. We're working on making the process a little smoother, but in the meantime you can check our [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) and [**this post**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed) for any further updates!

Oh, okay thank you!  

                      - The Monkey King {{champion:62}}
